lastfmr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get the last 50 tracks loved by a user.

Source: R/user.R
user_getLovedTracks.Rd

Get the last 50 tracks loved by a user. Implementation of last.fm's user.getLovedTracks API method (http://www.last.fm/api/show/user.getLovedTracks).

user_getLovedTracks(user, limit = NA, page = NA)

Arguments

user

The user name to fetch the loved tracks for.
limit

The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.
page

The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

Value

A list of the last 50 tracks loved by a user.

Examples

user_getLovedTracks("platyjus")
#>         name                                 mbid
#> 1      20:17                                     
#> 2 Near Light 2f69176a-5a5e-4b08-94c4-142da725d74c
#>                                                          url   date.uts
#> 1      https://www.last.fm/music/%C3%93lafur+Arnalds/_/20:17 1531429181
#> 2 https://www.last.fm/music/%C3%93lafur+Arnalds/_/Near+Light 1531429178
#>           date.#text    artist.name                          artist.mbid
#> 1 12 Jul 2018, 20:59 Ólafur Arnalds 6655955b-1c1e-4bcb-84e4-81bcd9efab30
#> 2 12 Jul 2018, 20:59 Ólafur Arnalds 6655955b-1c1e-4bcb-84e4-81bcd9efab30
